simrun3.synaptic_strength_fitting.merge_celltypes¶

simrun3.synaptic_strength_fitting.merge_celltypes(vt, detection_strings=['L2', 'L34', 'L4', 'L5st', 'L5tt', 'L6cc', 'L6ct', 'VPM_C2'], celltype_must_be_in=['L6cc', 'L2', 'VPM', 'L4py', 'L4ss', 'L4sp', 'L5st', 'L6ct', 'L34', 'L6ccinv', 'L5tt', 'Generic'])[source]¶

concatenates voltagetraces of celltypes
